org.echo.mobile.framework

Class EchoFrameworkImpl

  • org.echo.mobile.framework.EchoFrameworkImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssetsFacade, AuthenticationFacade, ContractsFacade, EchoFramework, FeeFacade, InformationFacade, SubscriptionFacade, TransactionsFacade

    public class EchoFrameworkImpl
implements EchoFramework

    Implementation of interface EchoFramework base library API

    Delegates all logic to specific facades

    All methods and services can lead to error if you use them without associated initialized api id, that eou need to specify in class Settings before library initialization

    See Also:
    interface EchoFramework, class Settings

      • getFeeForTransferOperation

        public void getFeeForTransferOperation(java.lang.String fromNameOrId,
                                       java.lang.String password,
                                       java.lang.String toNameOrId,
                                       java.lang.String amount,
                                       java.lang.String asset,
                                       java.lang.String feeAsset,
                                       java.lang.String message,
                                       Callback<java.lang.String> callback)

        Counts required fee for defined transaction settings

        Parameters:
        fromNameOrId - Source account name or id
        password - User account password for memo encryption
        toNameOrId - Target account name or id
        amount - Amount value of transfer
        asset - Specific asset type id
        feeAsset - Asset for fee calculating
        callback - Listener of operation results

      • getFeeForTransferOperationWithWif

                                              Callback<java.lang.String> callback)

        toNameOrId - Target account name or id
        amount - Amount value of transfer
        asset - Specific asset type id
        feeAsset - Asset for fee calculating
        callback - Listener of operation results

                                   Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)

        Unsubscribe listeners from observing account event changes with id = nameOrId

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Required account id to unsubscribe from
        callback - Listener of unsubscribing process state Receives true if unsubscribing succeed, otherwise false\error (if occurred)

      • unsubscribeAll

        public void unsubscribeAll(Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)

        Unsubscribe all listeners from observing all account changing events

        Parameters:
        callback - Listener of unsubscribing process state Receives true if unsubscribing succeed, otherwise false\error (if occurred)

      • sendTransferOperation

        public void sendTransferOperation(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                                  java.lang.String password,
                                  java.lang.String toNameOrId,
                                  java.lang.String amount,
                                  java.lang.String asset,
                                  java.lang.String feeAsset,
                                  java.lang.String message,
                                  Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)

        Submits transaction to blockchain

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Source account name or id
        password - Source account password for retrieving access to funds
        toNameOrId - Transfer target account name or id
        amount - Value amount of transfer operation
        asset - Specific asset type id
        feeAsset - Specific asset type id for calculating fee. If null - asset will be used
        message - Additional payload to transfer operation
        callback - Listener of operation results. Retrieves true if transfer succeed, otherwise - false

      • sendTransferOperationWithWif

        public void sendTransferOperationWithWif(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                                         java.lang.String wif,
                                         java.lang.String toNameOrId,
                                         java.lang.String amount,
                                         java.lang.String asset,
                                         java.lang.String feeAsset,
                                         java.lang.String message,
                                         Callback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)

        Submits transaction to blockchain

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Source account name or id
        wif - Account's private key in wif format
        toNameOrId - Transfer target account name or id
        amount - Value amount of transfer operation
        asset - Specific asset type id
        feeAsset - Specific asset type id for calculating fee. If null - asset will be used
        message - Additional payload to transfer operation
        callback - Listener of operation results. Retrieves true if transfer succeed, otherwise - false

      • getAccountHistory

        public void getAccountHistory(java.lang.String nameOrId,
                              java.lang.String transactionStartId,
                              java.lang.String transactionStopId,
                              int limit,
                              Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.HistoryResponse> callback)

        Retrieves account history with defining setting parameters

        Parameters:
        nameOrId - Source account name or id
        transactionStartId - ID of the most recent operation to retrieve
        transactionStopId - ID of the earliest operation to retrieve
        limit - Maximum number of operations to retrieve
        callback - Listener of operation results

      • createContract

        public void createContract(java.lang.String registrarNameOrId,
                           java.lang.String password,
                           java.lang.String assetId,
                           java.lang.String feeAsset,
                           java.lang.String byteCode,
                           java.util.List<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.contract.input.InputValue> params,
                           Callback<java.lang.Boolean> broadcastCallback,
                           Callback<java.lang.String> resultCallback)

        Creates contract on blockchain

        Parameters:
        registrarNameOrId - Name or id of account that creates the contract
        password - Password from account for transaction signature
        assetId - Asset of contract
        feeAsset - Asset for fee pay
        byteCode - Bytecode of the created contract
        params - Params for contract constructor
        broadcastCallback - Callback for result of operation broadcast
        resultCallback - Callback for retrieving result of operation (not required). Retrieves result of transactions if exists - history id which contains call contract result, if not exists - empty string

      • callContract

        public void callContract(java.lang.String userNameOrId,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         java.lang.String assetId,
                         java.lang.String feeAsset,
                         java.lang.String contractId,
                         java.lang.String methodName,
                         java.util.List<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.contract.input.InputValue> methodParams,
                         java.lang.String value,
                         Callback<java.lang.Boolean> broadcastCallback,
                         Callback<java.lang.String> resultCallback)

        Calls to contract on blockchain using account password

        Parameters:
        userNameOrId - Name or id of account that calls the contract
        password - Password from account for transaction signature
        assetId - Asset of contract
        feeAsset - Asset for fee pay
        contractId - Id of called contract
        methodName - Name of called method
        methodParams - Parameters of calling method
        value - Amount for payable methods
        broadcastCallback - Callback for result of operation deploying
        resultCallback - Callback for retrieving result of operation (not required). Retrieves result of transactions if exists - history id which contains call contract result, if not exists - empty string

                          java.util.List<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.contract.input.InputValue> methodParams,

        contractId - Id of called contract

        methodParams - Parameters of called method
